```{r, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
opts_knit$set(progress = FALSE, verbose = FALSE)
opts_chunk$set(warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE)
options(knitr.duplicate.label = "allow")
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r results="asis"}
.pl1 <- boxplot(iris)

.pl2 <- boxplot(iris[2])
height = 4
desc = "sth"
cat(knit(text = knit_expand(
  text =
      sprintf(
        "```{r, fig.height=%s}\n%s\n%s%s .pl1 %s .pl2\n",
        height,
        desc,
        cat('  \n## {.tabset}  \n'),
        cat('  \n### Means cell line-wise  \n'),
        cat(" \n### Means exp.group-wise  \n"))
)))
```
